content: fionadolls labubu crochet p attern julia kor @fionadolls june 2025 labubu crochet pattern fionadolls notes thank you for purchasing my crochet pattern my name is julia kor and i am an amigurumi designer passionate about creating unique crochet patterns this pattern is for personal use only please do not sell share reproduce publish translate or exchange this pattern in any form you are welcome to sell the finished items made using this pattern if you have any questions feel free to contact me through my shop or instagram @fionadolls i would love to see your creations please share your projects on instagram using the hashtag #fionadolls and tag me @fionadolls thank you for your support and happy crocheting materials and tools ● plush yarn usa yarn turkish yarn little bunny 30g alize softy plus 30g 100m 109yds 120m/ 100 g /100g color 181 blue color - 2079-05 premier parfait 10g himalaya 10g chunky 120m dolphin baby 131 yds 120m/100g color 1150-32 color shell ● black or brown and pink cotton yarn for embroidering the face ● white plush yarn for teeth ● hook us size g/6 4 mm ● glitter safety eyes 14 mm ● stuffing material fiberfill/ polyester ● tapestry needle ● scissors note if you want to crochet a small labubu using the same pattern you should use a 2 mm hook and alize softy and yarnart jeans yarns the crochet pattern remains the same the height will be approximately 5 inches including the ears 2 labubu crochet pattern fionadolls finished measurements 8 in/20 cm with ears using original plush yarn and hook g/6 4 mm skill level easy basic crocheting and sewing skills are required you can use any yarn to make this amigurumi for example if you use a bigger hook and a suitable yarn the toy will be bigger while maintaining the same proportions crochet abbreviations us terminology chain - chain slip_stitch slip_stitch decrease decrease half_double_crochet half_double_crochet increase increase double_crochet double_crochet magic_ring magic_ring repeat instructions in parenthesis n times round s - round s the number after = is the total number of single_crochet single_crochet stitches in the round st s - stitch s blo crochet for back loops only instructions 1 all pieces are worked in a spiral continuously this means that you do not end the round with a slip_stitch and do not start the round with a chain i start working every piece with a magic_ring but you can chain 2 and work the required number of single_crochet in the second stitch from the hook crochet tightly to ensure that stuffing does not poke through the stitches 2 how to change yarn color 1 follow the pattern in color 1 until the last stitch over and pull through the loop with the new color 2 2 leave the color 1 behind until it is time to work on it again 3 continue to work in color 2 until it is time to change the color back to 1 on the last st
